scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains press releases, faculty biographies, publicity materials, and other materials generated by the Radford University Public Relations department. Not all years are available, and some material is located in notebooks and has not been processed yet. Please note that photographs, negatives, and slides are described in the Public Relations Photo Collection finding aids.

Note: Not all files are available - some years are missing. Press releases are filed chronological by date issued, publications are listed by topic, and faculty profiles are alphabetical by faculty member.
